{{Expand list|date=June 2011}}

This is a '''list of [[public art]]works in [[Philadelphia]]'''.  The [[Association for Public Art]] estimates the city has thousands of public artworks;<ref>[http://www.fpaa.org/pa_map.html Fairmount Park Art Association]</ref> the Smithsonian lists more than 700.<ref>[http://siris-artinventories.si.edu/ipac20/ipac.jsp?session=132547696U3Y2.33278&profile=ariall&uri=link=3100008~!182369~!3100001~!3100002&aspect=Browse&menu=search&ri=8&source=~!siartinventories&term=Outdoor+Sculpture+--+Pennsylvania+--+Philadelphia&index=OBJEC SIRIS Inventory] Search "Object type browse" and "Outdoor Sculpture -- Pennsylvania -- Philadelphia"</ref>  Since 1959 nearly 400 works of public art have been created as part of the city's [[Percent for Art]] program, the first such program in the U.S.<ref>{{cite web|title=Percent for Art Program|url=http://www.phila.gov/pra/PDFs/Program_Intro.pdf|publisher=Philadelphia Redevelopment Authority|accessdate=December 1, 2012}}</ref> 

This list contains only works of public art in outdoor public spaces, and not, for example, works inside museums.  Most of the works mentioned are sculptures. Other kinds of art, i.e., [[sound installation]]s, are marked as such next to their titles.
